title: Riot give me my 17LP back
body:
So I had i game in which our toplaner left the game before the 3 minute mark. We didn't the chance to remake so we had to play the game till we end. Of course we lost it, after all in was a 4v5 wince the very beggining. So please be good people and give me back my 17 LP.
Thanks

replies.body: Sorry to hear about the leaver.  :/  Sometimes a 4v5 can be a winning chance because it's less kills for the other team, but yeah, being down a player totally sucks.  We can't alter LP or game stats, though, sorry friend!  Hope your next match takes a more positive turn!
You should be more concerned over the fact that the remake system doesn't trigger the way it should.
Im not rly sure how does it work, but that guy left just before the click hit 3:00, so I thought we should have got a remake.

Oh then it wouldn't have been possible. They had to have been dc for at least 90 seconds before the 3 min mark without a first blood happening to the one dced(meaning no requiting if they failed invade at the start of game). Once these are met then you can remake. However this is why I made a comment to the riot member here. I have seen people quit after dying and it allowed their team to remake. I have also been in games where it was a 4 v 5 the whole time since one of our teammates never loaded and we never got the ability to remake. It also doesn't work in ARAM at all.
Thanks for the fast answer! It's alright now, I just went on tilt cuz of that game which I should not have done!
